name: Amadeus' Wolfarm
description:
Amadeus has decided to leave the big city behind and move to the quiet and peaceful countryside. He has bought a piece of land and a bunch of chickens and is ready to conquer the farmer world.  However, things will not be easy since the area is full of voracious chicken-eater monsters and...

he is... he is... keeping a little secret.

At night...

He becomes a voracious werewolf!

During this stage, Amadeus is completly out of control and he will chase and hunt down all of the chickens ruining his own bussiness. Avoid this by increasing his sanity during the werewolf stage by repeatedly pressing the button in your preferred direction. If the sanity meter reaches its limit, Amadeus will deseperately run towards the chose direction trying to supress his wild instincts.

The game mechanics is built around a paradox: protect your chickens while you are a human but eat them while you are a werewolf.  You will always need to find a balance.

GAME OVER (3 conditions)

- Run out of chickens: no chicken no money. You can blame the monster or you can blame yourself and your apetite.

- Starvation: a werewolf need lots of energy every night. You will always have to pay attention to your food requirements every night. If the night ends and you have not filled you stomach you will die.

- Out of life: the monster will not be friendly with you. Recover your life by eating chickens at night.

PROTECT YOUR CHICKENS FROM THE MONSTERS AND FROM YOURSELF! DON'T BE TOO GREEDY OR THE WEREWOLF IN YOU WILL END UP STARVING!

You can test the browser version here: https://celophisis.itch.io/amadeus-wolfarm-html5 (NO DOWNLOAD REQUIRED!).

CONTROLS

System

- ENTER - Accept and Proceed with subsequent message.

Amadeus Human Stage

- WASD - Move

- MOUSE - Aim

- LEFT CLICK - Shoot and Buy chickens/roosters

Amadeus Werewolf Stage

- WASD - Increase sanity
